title: Good budget hotel option
text: After looking at tripadvisor to find a hotel in S.Francisco i decided for Adante hotel as it seemed a good value and good reviews.I've just came back from S.Francisco, staying at this hotel for 4 nights and I agree with the other travellers I was satisfied.I asked for a quiet room in the back and I got it and the staff was very friendly.I got all what you expected in a good budget hotel, the only think I missed was a refrigerator.The location is also very convenient.
